title: openzeppelin-contracts-upgradable: replace "if (A && B)" to save gas fees
body:
<!-- Briefly describe the issue you're experiencing. Tell us what you were trying to do and what happened instead. -->

<!-- Remember, this is not a place to ask for help debugging code. For that, we welcome you in the OpenZeppelin Community Forum: https://forum.openzeppelin.com/. -->

The solidity compiler generates more code for ‚Äúif (A && B) {}‚Äù than for ‚Äúif (A) {if (B) {} }‚Äù.
Our experiment shows that switching from ‚Äúif (A && B) {}‚Äù to ‚Äúif (A) {if (B) {} }‚Äù can save gas fee.

**üíª Environment**

<!-- Tell us what version of OpenZeppelin Contracts you're using, and how you're using it: Truffle, Remix, etc. -->

master branch

**üìù Details**

<!-- Describe the problem you have been experiencing in more detail. Include as much information as you think is relevant. Keep in mind that transactions can fail for many reasons; context is key here. -->

Similar to issue [4404](https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts/issues/4404), there are nine such cases in openzeppelin-contracts-upgradable

https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/blob/03b0aeb8e6b0badadbab83003c0456912fa06f89/contracts/utils/ArraysUpgradeable.sol#L45

https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/blob/03b0aeb8e6b0badadbab83003c0456912fa06f89/contracts/token/ERC20/extensions/ERC4626Upgradeable.sol#L97

https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/blob/03b0aeb8e6b0badadbab83003c0456912fa06f89/contracts/governance/extensions/GovernorPreventLateQuorumUpgradeable.sol#L69

https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/blob/03b0aeb8e6b0badadbab83003c0456912fa06f89/contracts/governance/utils/VotesUpgradeable.sol#L203

https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/blob/03b0aeb8e6b0badadbab83003c0456912fa06f89/contracts/governance/GovernorUpgradeable.sol#L200

https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/blob/03b0aeb8e6b0badadbab83003c0456912fa06f89/contracts/access/AccessControlDefaultAdminRulesUpgradeable.sol#L121

https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/blob/03b0aeb8e6b0badadbab83003c0456912fa06f89/contracts/token/ERC20/utils/SafeERC20Upgradeable.sol#L119

https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/blob/03b0aeb8e6b0badadbab83003c0456912fa06f89/contracts/access/AccessControlDefaultAdminRulesUpgradeable.sol#L154

https://github.com/OpenZeppelin/openzeppelin-contracts-upgradeable/blob/03b0aeb8e6b0badadbab83003c0456912fa06f89/contracts/utils/math/MathUpgradeable.sol#L218

**üî¢ Code to reproduce bug**
